# RSA3
## writeup

you were given e, n, c without any missuse so you cant get the flag 
but there is a gift for you

the gift  = p+q

the goal is to calculate phi and d

so the trick here is you need to use some math

```
phi = (p-1) * (q-1)
phi = (p*q) - p - q +1
phi = n - (p + q) +1
phi = n - (p + q) +1

we have all this so we calculate the phi and then d and get the flag
```

solve script :
```py
from Crypto.Util.number import long_to_bytes

e=65537




phi = n - gift + 1

d = pow(e, -1, phi)

flag = pow(c, d, n)

print(long_to_bytes(flag))
```
